envelopes.name: Policy Risk Assessment
assumptions: Risk models trained on historical claims data and actuarial tables.
Assessments consider geographical, demographic, and behavioral factors.
Underwriters review AI recommendations for policies exceeding thresholds.
constraints: No use of protected characteristics (race, religion, etc.) in risk scoring
High-risk classifications require human underwriter justification
Rate recommendations must align with state regulatory limits

envelopes.name: Claims Triage & Fraud Detection
assumptions: Fraud detection balances false positives with loss prevention.
Automated triage speeds legitimate claims processing.
Pattern analysis identifies suspicious claim networks.
constraints: Fraud flags must include specific indicators for adjuster review
Never auto-deny claims — only recommend further investigation
Claimants notified of delays within 48 hours

envelopes.name: Premium Pricing & Quote Generation
assumptions: Dynamic pricing reflects real-time risk assessment and market conditions.
Discount eligibility is transparent and consistently applied.
Price optimization balances competitiveness with profitability.
constraints: Premium increases limited to 15% per renewal without review
Quotes valid for 30 days from generation
Discounts must not create discriminatory pricing patterns

envelopes.name: Regulatory Compliance & Reporting
assumptions: Automated compliance checks against state and federal regulations.
Model fairness testing detects disparate impact before deployment.
Audit trails maintain 10-year retention for regulatory inquiries.
constraints: All AI-driven decisions must be explainable to regulators
Quarterly fairness audits required for risk models
Material model changes require actuarial sign-off

events.label: Historical baseline: Standard risk patterns

events.label: Historical baseline: Competitive pricing
events.detail: Pre-existing decision memory: Renewal pricing strategies and customer retention patterns.

events.label: Market conditions baseline
events.detail: Industry-wide loss ratios stable at 64%. No major weather events predicted for next 48 hours. Market competitiveness index: 0.82.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Policy risk assessment envelope (REV-INS-001-D) activated with enhanced fairness constraints.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Claims triage and fraud detection envelope (REV-INS-002-C) activated with updated pattern recognition.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Regulatory compliance and reporting envelope activated for Q1 audit cycle.

events.label: Queried standard risk patterns
events.detail: RiskScorer retrieved baseline auto insurance risk assessment patterns.

events.label: Application volume surge detected
events.detail: New policy applications up 18% from prior week. Competitor rate increase in market driving shopping behavior.

events.label: Auto insurance policy assessed
events.detail: RiskScorer evaluated new auto policy application. Risk score: 72/100 (standard risk). Recommended rate: $1,240/year.

events.label: Coastal flood risk elevated
events.detail: National Weather Service upgraded flood watch to warning for coastal regions. Hurricane season forecast indicates above-average activity.

events.label: Queried decision memory
events.detail: ThresholdEscalator retrieved historical high-risk coastal property patterns before escalation decision.
events.queryText: high risk coastal property flood prior claims

events.label: High-risk application escalated
events.detail: ThresholdEscalator flagged homeowner's policy with risk score 89/100 (elevated flood risk + prior claims). Routed to senior underwriter.

events.label: Underwriter reviewed flood risk policy
events.detail: Senior Underwriter #12 retrieved historical flood risk underwriting decisions and mitigation strategies before approval.
events.queryText: flood risk coastal property high threshold mitigation requirement underwriting

events.label: Underwriter approved with conditions
events.detail: Senior underwriter accepted policy with flood mitigation requirement (sump pump installation). Premium adjusted to $2,850/year.

events.label: Flood mitigation requirement codified
events.detail: Underwriting Steward updated envelope to require flood mitigation verification for similar high-risk coastal properties.
events.reason: Codify manual underwriter decision pattern for flood risk properties to improve consistency.

events.label: Policy update: Flood risk requirements
events.detail: Stored policy revision requiring flood mitigation verification for high-risk coastal properties.
events.semanticContext: flood mitigation coastal property high risk underwriting constraint

events.label: Retrieve recent policy revisions
events.detail: DecisionMemory retrieves recent revision embedding for flood mitigation policy update.

events.label: Queried claims patterns
events.detail: ClaimTriager retrieved standard claims processing patterns before triage decision.
events.queryText: auto accident claim damage assessment standard

events.label: Auto claim fast-tracked
events.detail: ClaimTriager assessed minor fender-bender claim. Low complexity, clear liability. Approved for automated processing ($1,850 payout).

events.label: High-risk policy denied
events.detail: RiskScorer evaluated commercial property in flood zone with no mitigation history. Risk score: 94/100 (uninsurable). Application declined with referral to specialty market.

events.label: High-risk denial embedded
events.detail: Stored uninsurable risk denial pattern for extreme flood risk without mitigation.
events.semanticContext: commercial property flood zone uninsurable risk denial specialty market referral

events.label: Claims volume spike detected
events.detail: Auto collision claims up 32% this week. Correlation with icy road conditions and recent storm. Regional pattern suggests weather-related surge.

events.label: Queried fraud patterns
events.detail: FraudDetector retrieved historical fraud detection patterns before escalation.
events.queryText: multiple claims repair shop network pattern

events.label: Fraud indicators detected
events.detail: FraudDetector flagged claim for further investigation: 3 prior claims in 18 months, inconsistent damage timeline, repair shop flagged in network.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Premium pricing and quote generation envelope (REV-INS-003-B) activated with market competitiveness tracking.

events.label: Bundle discount applied
events.detail: DiscountEvaluator identified customer eligible for multi-policy discount (auto + home). Quote reduced from $3,200 to $2,720/year (15% savings).

events.label: Claim investigation completed
events.detail: Claims adjuster reviewed fraud-flagged case. Evidence validated claim legitimacy. Prior claims were different vehicles. Claim approved for $4,200 payout.

events.label: Fraud detection refinement
events.detail: Claims Steward updated fraud detection to exclude cases with different vehicle registrations in claim history analysis.
events.reason: Reduce false positives in fraud detection by improving vehicle tracking logic.

events.label: Policy update: Fraud detection logic
events.detail: Stored policy revision refining vehicle tracking in fraud detection to reduce false positives.
events.semanticContext: fraud detection vehicle registration claim history false positive

events.label: Competitive rate pressure increasing
events.detail: Market analysis shows 3 major competitors reduced premiums by 5-8% in past month. Customer shopping rate up 24%. Retention pressure building.

events.label: Model fairness audit complete
events.detail: ModelAuditor ran disparate impact analysis on risk scoring. No significant disparities detected across protected groups. Gini coefficient: 0.03 (threshold: 0.10).

events.label: Queried premium adjustment patterns
events.detail: QuoteGenerator retrieved historical premium increase patterns and retention strategies before escalation.
events.queryText: premium increase renewal threshold retention strategy

events.label: Premium increase exceeds threshold
events.detail: QuoteGenerator calculated 18% renewal increase due to claims history. Exceeds 15% limit — escalated to pricing review.

events.label: Steward reviewed pricing exception policy
events.detail: Alicia Rodriguez retrieved pricing threshold exceptions and retention strategy guidelines before approving the 18% increase.
events.queryText: pricing threshold exception retention strategy claims history renewal increase

events.label: Exception approved
events.detail: Pricing Steward approved 18% increase with customer notification and retention offer (accident forgiveness program).

events.label: Premium threshold policy update
events.detail: Pricing Steward updated envelope to allow up to 20% renewal increases (beyond the 15% threshold) when paired with retention incentives like accident forgiveness programs and flexible payment plans.
events.reason: Address premium increase threshold boundary by enabling competitive retention strategies while maintaining customer transparency.

events.label: Policy update: Pricing flexibility with retention
events.detail: Stored policy revision allowing 20% premium increases (above 15% threshold) when paired with retention incentives.
events.semanticContext: pricing premium increase renewal threshold retention incentive accident forgiveness payment plan

events.label: DSG: Risk model calibration
events.detail: Underwriting Stewardship Group reviewed 247 high-risk escalations. Adjusted risk score thresholds for coastal properties.

events.label: Fraud pattern alert: repair shop network
events.detail: Analytics detected suspicious clustering: 4 repair shops with 28% higher-than-average claim rates. Cross-referencing with claimant networks.

events.label: Risk threshold adjusted
events.detail: Underwriting Steward updated high-risk escalation threshold from 85 to 88 after DSG review. Reduces false escalations while maintaining safety margins.
events.reason: Refine escalation criteria to focus underwriter attention on truly complex cases.

events.label: Queried explainability standards
events.detail: ExplainabilityEngine retrieved regulatory explainability requirements and documentation patterns before escalation.
events.queryText: denial documentation structured justification regulatory explainability audit trail

events.label: Explainability gap identified
events.detail: ExplainabilityEngine flagged 3 high-risk denials with insufficient justification documentation. Routed to compliance review.

events.label: Documentation requirements addressed
events.detail: Compliance Steward reviewed cases and added detailed rationale documentation. All denials now meet regulatory explainability standards.

events.label: Documentation review embedded
events.detail: Stored compliance review pattern for addressing explainability gaps in denial documentation.
events.semanticContext: compliance documentation explainability gap resolution regulatory standards

events.label: Enhanced explainability requirements
events.detail: Compliance Steward added constraint requiring detailed justification templates for all high-risk denials before submission.
events.reason: Prevent explainability gaps by enforcing structured documentation at decision time.

events.label: Policy update: Explainability templates required
events.detail: Stored policy revision requiring detailed justification templates for high-risk denials.
events.semanticContext: explainability compliance denial justification template documentation

events.label: Regulatory update: new disclosure requirements
events.detail: State insurance commission issued bulletin requiring enhanced AI decision transparency. Effective in 45 days. Impacts denial documentation.

events.label: Claims processing metrics
events.detail: Fast-track claims: 68% auto-processed. Fraud detection precision: 87%. Average investigation time: 4.2 days (target: <5 days).

events.label: Queried fraud network patterns
events.detail: FraudDetector retrieved organized fraud patterns and historical network analysis before escalation.
events.queryText: fraud vehicle registration false positive tracking network claims history

events.label: Confirmed fraud case escalated
events.detail: FraudDetector identified organized fraud ring: 7 claims submitted by same claimant network with staged accidents. Evidence includes GPS data contradictions and repair shop collusion. Case forwarded to special investigations unit.

events.label: Escalation: Organized fraud ring detected
events.detail: Stored boundary escalation involving organized fraud with GPS contradictions and repair shop collusion.
events.semanticContext: fraud organized network staged accident GPS collusion escalation

events.label: SIU reviewed fraud investigation protocols
events.detail: SIU Lead Investigator retrieved organized fraud case precedents and criminal referral procedures before final denial.
events.queryText: organized fraud network criminal referral investigation denial claims collusion

events.label: Claims denied - fraud confirmed
events.detail: Special Investigations Unit completed review. All 7 claims denied based on evidence of coordinated fraud. Total exposure prevented: $127,000. Criminal referral submitted to law enforcement.

events.label: Fraud confirmation embedded
events.detail: Stored confirmed fraud case with network analysis and criminal referral patterns.
events.semanticContext: organized fraud confirmed criminal referral coordinated claims network investigation

events.label: Network fraud detection enhanced
events.detail: Claims Steward updated fraud detection to include cross-claim network analysis and GPS timeline validation for related parties.
events.reason: Strengthen fraud detection capabilities based on organized fraud ring patterns.

events.label: Policy update: Network fraud analysis
events.detail: Stored policy revision adding cross-claim network analysis and GPS validation for fraud detection.

events.label: Customer retention rate improving

events.label: Regulatory report submitted
events.detail: RegulatoryChecker compiled quarterly compliance report for state insurance commission. 0 violations detected, 3 minor process improvements recommended.

events.label: Wildfire risk season begins

events.detail: CompetitivenessMonitor: Company rates 8% below market average for standard risk, 12% above for high risk. Conversion rate: 34% (industry: 28%).

events.label: Model fairness audit: Q2 results
events.detail: Quarterly disparate impact analysis complete. Approval rate variance across demographics: 1.8% (target: <3%). Zero regulatory red flags. Model performance stable.

events.label: Claims processing velocity improving
events.detail: Average claim resolution time reduced to 3.8 days (from 4.2). Fraud detection accuracy improved to 91%. Customer satisfaction score: 4.3/5.0.

events.label: Underwriting summary
events.detail: Policies issued: 1,847. Auto-approved: 72%. Escalated: 28%. Average turnaround: 2.1 days. Loss ratio projection: 62% (target: <65%).
